question: How long does each palpitation episode last?
Does the palpitations feel regular or irregular?
Any documented heart rate during episodes of palpitations and via what mode e.g. BP machine, steptracker?(Max. 50 characters)
Is there any possibility of pregnancy?
Are there hot flushes, loss of weight, tremors, heat intolerance or neck swelling?
Do you have any of the following:
subQuestion: • Family history of sudden cardiac death or weak heart?
• Palpitations with fainting or near fainting episodes?
• Shortness of breath, leg swelling or requiring more than 1 pillow to sleep at night?
• History of stroke or irregular heart rate

question: Is this the first time having such palpitations?
